ygData.subject: CB trains.
ygData.msgSnippet: DING!!!Level 7 in 1 minute(using CB belts,of course)! You ve never truly felt the wrath of the orcs until you see a train in CB.Example:I was bored so I went
ygData.messageBody:
DING!!!Level 7 in 1 minute(using CB belts,of
course)! You've never truly felt the wrath of the orcs
until you see a train in CB.Example:I was bored so I
went to go kill a little orc pawn for amusement.As I'm
bonking the bejesus out of him with my cracked staff he
runs to the slave camp part of crush bone and tells 2
legionaires(supposedly his parents)"Mom,Dad!Dreevil was trying to take
my CB belt!"I ran like hell from the con red
legionaires as the orc children(pawns)threw rocks and sticks
at me,"It's the belt stealer,get im'!"<br>I ran up
some hills,to the entrance(by this time I had added
about 3 more orcs to the already 5 chasing me)and as I
ran by I caught a glimpse of Emperor Crush and his
royal guards with the bodies of almost everyone of the
zone on the floor.I run,jump through the zone...and
make it!<br><br>The Moral:Don't kill it if it's near
it's parents!<br><br>Dreevil<br>High Elf<br>4th Level
Cleric<br>Prexxus
